articles.summary: Pi Network price has slipped 3.2% over yesterday to trade near $0.384. Pi Network has been unable to hold above the key $00.40 mark since yesterday. The price of Pi Network is expected to rise as soon as the token unlock is achieved.

articles.title: Bitcoin's biggest Wall Street backer takes the wheel at World Economic Forum
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: BlackRock's CEO, a major Bitcoin backer, became the interim co-chair of the WEF board. He will be in charge until the end of this year's World Economic Forum, which takes place in Davos in February.   .

articles.title: ETH gains to highest level against BTC in 2025, reaching new 365-day average
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: Ethereum (ETH) is expanding against BTC. The ETH/BTC ratio is at a new yearly peak. ETH added $1,000 in a week, while BTC consolidated. ETH is trading at 0.039 BTC, the highest level in 2025.
